mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LR_TASK_PARAMETER_DEF` ( `task_parameter_def_id` INTEGER (16) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `task_parameter_def_key` VARCHAR (64), `name` VARCHAR (128), `is_required` INTEGER (2), `is_binary` INTEGER (2), `template` LONGTEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`task_parameter_def_id`));
